author: JR Still
time: I'm going to assume I've got the right lad here. Thanks for coming around and letting me know about the next door neighbours dogs, we found them. Sorry for getting a little big aggressive and I apologize immensely to you and the bird you were with for that. You two were doing the the right thing. Top geezer in my books. Thanks again and have a good night mate.

author: Hamish Watson
time: You can now call each other and see information such as Active Status and when you've read messages.
